Sentencas: Solid Oxide Fuel Cell (SOFC) integrated into Micro Gas Turbine (MGT) is a multivariable nonlinear and strong coupling system.
Titulo: Power decoupling control of a solid oxide fuel cell and micro gas turbine hybrid power system

Sentencas: To enable the SOFC and MGT hybrid power system to follow the load profile accurately, this paper proposes a self-tuning PID decoupling controller based on a modified output-input feedback (OIF) Elman neural network model to track the MGT output power and SOFC output power.
Titulo: Power decoupling control of a solid oxide fuel cell and micro gas turbine hybrid power system

Sentencas: During the modeling, in order to avoid getting into a local minimum, and improved particle swarm optimization (PSO) alogorithm is employed to optimize the weights of the OIF Elman neural network.
Titulo: Power decoupling control of a solid oxide fuel cell and micro gas turbine hybrid power system

Sentencas: Using the modified OIF Elman neural network identifier, the SOFC/MGT hybrid system is identified on-line, and the parameters of the PID controller are tuned automatically.
Titulo: Power decoupling control of a solid oxide fuel cell and micro gas turbine hybrid power system

Sentencas: Furthermore, the corresponding decoupling control law is achieved by the conventional PID control algorithm.
Titulo: Power decoupling control of a solid oxide fuel cell and micro gas turbine hybrid power system

Sentencas: The validity and accuracy of the decoupling controller are tested by simulations in MATLAB environment.
Titulo: Power decoupling control of a solid oxide fuel cell and micro gas turbine hybrid power system

Sentencas: The simulation results verify that the proposed control strategy can achieve favorable control performance with regard to various load disturbances.
Titulo: Power decoupling control of a solid oxide fuel cell and micro gas turbine hybrid power system
Power decoupling control of a solid oxide fuel cell and micro gas turbine hybrid power system
